SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class ClientListenerTUI

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.network.ClientListenerTUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
IClientListener, Serializable, Remote
public class ClientListenerTUI extends UnicastRemoteObject implements IClientListener
this class is used by the server to communicate with the client via RMI (it's used so that the server can invoke these methods, which then invoke the client's view methods)
See Also:

    • notifySuccessfulRegistration

      public void notifySuccessfulRegistration(String name, boolean b, String token, boolean first) throws RemoteException
      notifySuccessfulRegistration method is used to notify about the success (or failure) of the client's login.
      Specified by:
      notifySuccessfulRegistration in interface IClientListener
      Parameters:
      name - - username of the client.
      b - - boolean signalling the success or failure of the login procedure.
      token - - token used to identify the client.
      first - - boolean used to signal whether the player needs to create a waiting room or not.
      Throws:
      RemoteException

      method notifyRearrangeOk used to notify the player about the success or failure of the re-arrange.
      Specified by:
      notifyRearrangeOk in interface IClientListener
      Parameters:
      ok - - boolean signalling the success or failure of the move.
      tiles - - contains the re-arranged tiles so that the player can view them.
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • notifyTilesOk

      public void notifyTilesOk(int ok, ArrayList<Position> tiles) throws RemoteException
      method notifyTilesOk used to notify the player whether the choice of tiles was a success or a failure.
      Specified by:
      notifyTilesOk in interface IClientListener
      Parameters:
      ok - - integer signaling whether the move was successful or not (0 = success, 1 = tiles not adjacent, 2 = tiles not in the same row/column, 3 = tiles not from the edge, 4 = not enough space in shelf, 5 = the tiles is not pickable).
      tiles - - contains the tiles chosen by the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException
